name: Spider Ninja: Man Of Future Fight
name_original: Spider Ninja: Man Of Future Fight
description:
A Ninja was transformed by science, he become very powerful and agility. He want to be a super hero so he call himself Spider Ninja!

Man-spider has always been known for his strength, courage and bravery. But the city arrived many hostile alien creatures who want to take over the planet arrived! One spider ninja man cannot cope, we must help him! Let's destroy all the enemy!

*Exciting gameplay
*Infinite level!
*3D graphics
*Great animation!

Look for your opponents, run and destroy these monsters! Prove you are able to protect themselves and the Earth from alien monsters! Be the hero everyone is looking for!
